alert.note: Alert for West Slopes South Central Cascades and Passes (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 05 at 4:52AM PDT until April 05 at 10:00AM PDT by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PDT THIS MORNING ABOVE 2500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow above 2500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Cascade mountains and valleys of Pierce and Lewis Counties, including the Crystal Mountain Ski Area, Paradise on Mount Rainier, Ashford, Randle, and Packwood. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions in Washington state, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: West Slopes South Central Cascades and Passes
